name: Accessibility Improvements
author: Patrice
description:
Adds a system setting to allow the user to change the action to display the buttons on an image (rather than just hovering over it). Default is set to hover (current UI behavior), can be changed to use mouse buttons in the system settings.
Also adds an option to disable the right-click contextual menu on most elements of the page (still allowed in input and text boxes)

name: Daily Folders
author: Patrice
description: Format folder names as YYYY-MM-DD for saving images (one folder per day).

name: Disable Source Image Zoom
author: Patrice
description: Adds a system setting to disable the source image zoom on hover in the task list.

name: GPU Mode Quick Toggle
author: Patrice
description: Adds a toggle to the preview toolbar to quickly toggle the GPU mode between "low" and "balanced" setting.

name: Image Editor Improvements
author: Patrice
description:
Features:
- Shows the actual brush in the image editor for increased precision.
- Add img2img source image via drag & drop from external file or browser image (incl. rendered image). Just drop the image in the editor pane.
- Add img2img source image by pasting an image from the clipboard
- Integrates seamlessly with Scrolling Panes 1.8+
- Adds support for reloading task from metadata embedded in PNG and JPEG images (use Ctrl+Drop image in the editor pane)
- Automatically sets the size of the output image to the size of the image used for img2img if its dimensions are both valid options (works with both copy/paste and drag & drop).
- makes the brushes more visible in the image/inpainting editor.

name: Image Modifier Improvements
author: Patrice
description:
Features:
- Allows for multiple custom modifier categories (use # to name your categories)
- Restores the image modifier cards upon reloading the page.
- Adds a Clear All button on top of the task's image modifiers.
- Drop images on the modifier cards to set a custom visual (square pictures work best, e.g. 512x512).
- Adds import/export capabilities to the custom category editor (also exports/imports custom visuals).
- Collapses other categories when selecting a new one.
- Search box for quick search through custom and predefined modifiers.
8. Supports assigning LoRA's to image modifiers, including optional multipliers. Adding/removing LoRA tags preserves the existing images as long as the syntax is respected.
Syntax:
#Custom category 1
Custom modifier 1 <lora:loraname1>
Custom modifier 2 <lora:loraname2:weight>
...

name: LoRA Prompt Parser
author: Patrice
description: Copying and pasting a prompt with a LoRA tag (e.g. from CivitAI.com will automatically select the corresponding LoRA in the Easy Diffusion dropdown, adjust the weight, and remove the LoRA tag from the prompt. The LoRA must be already available in the corresponding Easy Diffusion dropdown (this is not a LoRA downloader).

name: Make Image Always Visible
author: Patrice
description: Makes the Make Image button always visible.

name: Processing Order Quick Toggle
author: Patrice
description: Adds a toggle to the preview toolbar to quickly switch the queue processing order. Also fixes the display of the autoscroll toggle.

name: Random Seed Quick Toggle
author: Patrice
description: Adds a toggle to the preview toolbar to quickly switch the random seed setting. Also fixes the display of the autoscroll toggle.

name: Prompt Diff
author: Patrice
description: Shows what text was added/removed between two consecutive prompts.

name: Prompt Translator
author: Patrice
description: PLEASE NOTE YOUR PROMPTS WILL BE SENT TO GOOGLE TRANSLATE. Enter prompts in your native language, e.g. in French, une mystÃ©rieuse porte dans la forÃªt. Prompts are seamlessly translated to English before being rendered. Default language is set to English (no translation), can be changed in the dropdown in the Settings pane.

name: Queue Size
author: Patrice
description: Shows the count of active tasks and outstanding images in the Easy Diffusion status.

name: Scrolling Panes
author: Patrice
description: Allows editor and preview panes to scroll independently and adds a toggle to hide the editor pane.

name: Seed Randomizer
author: Patrice
description: Adds a new system setting to randomize, thus increasing the variability of images ran in batches. E.g. can run "A pug wearing a {red, blue, green} hat" as 3 tasks with different seeds, thus yielding more variety in the results.

name: Template Manager
author: Patrice
description:
A simple template library manager. Save/restore metadata as templates without having to mess with .txt or .json files. If you found a prompt/model/sampler/etc. combination that you really like, this is an easy way to save it so you can create more of the same later.

Features:
- Save/reload task *templates*
- Search box for easy access
- Supports template renaming and deletion
- Export/import function to back up and restore your templates
- Can restore seeds (optional)

name: Toggle Spellcheck
author: Patrice
description: Adds a system setting to turn the spell check on and off for the prompt, negative prompt, and image modifiers text areas.

name: Rabbit Hole UI
author: AssassinJN
description: Generates a grid of prompts to run against. Can be used to step through Inference Steps, samplers, Guidance Scales or all modifiers.

name: OutpaintIt
author: Avidgamefan
description:
Add-on to your image by "Outpainting" in any of the 4 directions, or all sides at once, with just one click.  Click on the label to produce multiple images in a batch run.

Currently, it will limit itself to the maximum capacity of an 8GB VRAM video card.  If you need to change the limits higher or lower, you will need to edit the file.

name: ScaleUp
author: Avidgamefan
description:
Modest scaling up, maintaining close ratio, with img2img to increase resolution of output while adding minor details.  Click on the label to switch between normal and preserve-details.

Currently, it will limit itself to the maximum capacity of an 8GB VRAM video card.  If you need to change the limits higher or lower, you will need to edit the file.

name: Make Very Similar Images
author: Avidgamefan
description: Make another image similar to the one you have.  Automatically adjusts the number of steps depending upon Turbo (or similar) model or Lora.

name: History
author: rbertus2000
description: Adds a new column to keep a history of all prompts/settings that were used in this session.

name: Switch Width & Height Settings
author: ogmaresca
description: Adds a button to switch the width and height values.

name: Advanced Prompt Plugin
author: 3V1LXD
description: This tool adds an optional collapsible advanced prompt table below the prompt field, allowing you to generate and organize your prompts more efficiently, randomize modifiers, step through image settings, chat and auto prompt LLMs.

name: Easy Dream Studio Plugin
author: 3V1LXD
description: Easy Dream Studio (EDS) is a transformative plugin for the Easy Diffusion (ED) application that aims to replicate the UI of Stability.ai's Dream Studio. As a front-end for the image-generating software Stable Diffusion, Dream Studio's UI has inspired the design of EDS. Leveraging the similar UI structure of ED, the EDS plugin applies a series of changes to create a similar appearance and functionality of Dream Studio, offering users a familiar and intuitive experience while using Easy Diffusion.

name: Grid Renders (Beta)
author: Madrang
description:
First ever version, if anyone want's to try it.
Work only on the Beta version of the UI for now.

Start with low amount of steps and guidance as the plugin will increase it.

name: clearAllEmpty
author: Sparkling
description: adds a button to clear all empty requests if you queued a lot and then pressed Stop All, this removes all the not done tasks

name: CopySeed
author: Sparkling
description: if you hover over an image and double click the seed info, the seed will be copied to the image settings

name: rename_session
author: Sparkling
description: this allows you to rename the current session and change the output folder name for the created images

name: autoscroll_rename
author: Sparkling
description: this changes the text from "Scroll to generated images" which is pretty long to "autoscroll" to save space

name: GIFs Plugin (Beta)
author: Madrang
description:
Here's the first test version for making GIFs
Using the Beta version of the UI is required for now.

After installing, you will have new Output Format
While stepAnim display in the normal place, gif needs popup permissions as it will create a new tab/window when completing a render.

Making a popup UI with more options is still on the To-Do list...
To edit the options the code has to be changed until the UI part is done.

Going above 100 inferences steps with stepAnim is risky on SD1.# as some of those values will fail but it works perfectly with SD2.# models.

name: Animate
author: FairytaleArtist
description:
Allows you to upload a series of images, a GIF, or an MP4 video and render them in Easy Diffusion. Basically, you can create animations with it or apply the same effect to multiple images.
*To use click browse and select a sequence of images. Then click the Animate button (under Make Images button) and the plugin will output a modified version of each frame.
For example: load a sequence of images, a GIF, or an MP4 video of a wolf walking->write in the prompt area "tiger walking"-> click Animate button->watch the magic happen

name: Queue-Counter
author: FairytaleArtist
description:
Shows in the tab title how many tasks are left to process.
This is useful if you render a lot of images and want to browse the internet without needing to check the tab if it's finished.

name: Story Teller
author: FairytaleArtist
description:
This plugin helps you to create stories using Generative-AI. It helps to select photos of stories you generate and add subtitles to them.
Example for usage flow:
Ask Chat-GPT to create a short story.
Copy the text into the prompt area
Choose your image-modifiers, styles and settings.
Set number of images to 4 and click 'Make Images'
Mouse over  each image you would like to keep and click 'Add to Storyteller' - the image will be added to a list at the top right
Click save on each image - this will store the new images with appropriate names

name: Spell Tokenizer
author: Solid Dissipation
description:
Script to help with spell (prompt) building
-create individual spell tokens to rearrange and modulate by using commas
-drag and drop tokens to rearrange order
-hold ALT+scroll over a token to emphasize or de-emphasize
-right click to delete a token
-see a rough estimate for token count
-enter link to a booru page to extract all tags from it, precede link with _ to replaces spaces with underscores in tags
-recognize duplicate tags.

name: Easy Diffusion Parser
author: Madrang
description:
An advanced parser for Easy Diffusion with support for blending and weights.

You'll need to start your prompts with an exclamation mark, e.g. !photo of an (astronaut) to use the advanced syntax. Without ! it will send the text literally to the model.

name: Mad's Render Tasks
author: Madrang
description: Adds Redo (a make similar with a prompt to change the options) and Resize. The legend says there are certain plugins that change the way you work, and that is one of those. ðŸ¤· Beta is untested and is still WIP. Main has more testing but may not have all features available while they are still under test.

name: Mad's Render Tasks (Beta)
author: Madrang
description: Adds Redo (a make similar with a prompt to change the options), Resize, and "Warp" that allows to crop, resize and zoom all in one render operation. The legend says there are certain plugins that change the way you work, and that is one of those. ðŸ¤· Beta is untested and is still WIP. Main has more testing but may not have all features available while they are still under test.

name: Prompt Help Button
author: ogmaresca
description:
Adds a help button for the prompt.

This is only for the diffusers engine.

name: Filename & Folder Format
author: ogmaresca
description: Adds settings for the filename and folder formats.

name: Image Utilities
author: The Stig
description:
Adds various functions for use with generated images.
Icon guide as follows.
- Rotate Left.
- Rotate Right.
- Expand image based on Seamless Tiling setting.
- Download image and datafile using EDyyyymmdd-hhmmss format for filenames.
- Display information below generated image

name: LoRA Controls
author: The Stig
description:
Controls the strength of the current LoRA.
Icon guide as follows.
- Set LoRA strength to -2.00.
- Set LoRA strength to -1.00.
-Reduce LoRA strength.
- Set LoRA strength to +0.50.
- Increase LoRA strength.
- Set LoRA strength to +1.00.
-Set LoRA strength to +2.00.
- Create images based on a range of LoRA strength from 0.00 to +1.00.

LoRa Grid Icons
- Create images based on a range of LoRA strength from -2.00 to -1.00.
- Create images based on a range of LoRA strength from -1.00 to 0.00.
- Create images based on a range of LoRA strength from 0.00 to +1.00.
- Create images based on a range of LoRA strength from +1.00 to +2.00.
- Create images based on a range of LoRA strength from -2.00 to +2.00.

name: Hypernetwork Controls
author: The Stig
description:
Controls the strength of the current Hypernetwork.
Icon guide as follows.
- Set Hypernetwork strength to minimum.
- Reduce Hypernetwork strength.
- Set Hypernetwork strength to mid point.
- Increase Hypernetwork strength.
- Set Hypernetwork strength to maximum.
- Create images based on a range of Hypernetwork strength from minimum to maximum.

name: Models Controls
author: The Stig
description:
Allows you to switch through which Model is being used.
Icon guide as follows.
- Select the First Model.
- Select the Previous Model.
- Select the Next Model.
- Select the Last Model.
- Select a Random Model.
- Create a batch of images based on selected Models.
To select your Models click on the Set Favourite Model button above the Image Settings panel.

NB At present the Favourite Model feature doesn't support Models that are stored in sub-folders.

name: Samplers Controls
author: The Stig
description:
Allows you to switch through which Sampler is being used.
Icon guide as follows.
- Select the First Sampler.
- Select the Previous Sampler.
- Select the Next Sampler.
- Select the Last Sampler.
- Create a batch of images using all the Samplers.

name: Scheduler Controls
author: The Stig
description:
Allows you to switch through which Scheduler is being used.
Icon guide as follows.
- Select the First Scheduler.
- Select the Previous Scheduler.
- Select the Next Scheduler.
- Select the Last Scheduler.
- Create a batch of images using all the Schedulers.

name: Blend to Image
author: The Stig
description: A simple plugin to allow two prompts to be blended together.

name: Sequence to ControlNet
author: The Stig
description:
A simple plugin to allow multiple images to be imported and used in ControlNet.
Instructions as follows.
- Set up an image in the ControlNet section as per usual.
- Select which ControlNet model you want to use.
- Set up your prompt, image size, seed etc as required.
- Click on the 'Select a sequence' button above the Image Settings panel.
- Select which images you wish to import.

name: Dress me up
author: The Stig
description:
Plugin to assist with your creativity.
You can choose between a wide range of clothing options (primarily female based).

name: Build A Scene
author: The Stig
description:
Plugin to assist with your creativity.
You can choose between a wide range of options to help create a scene.

name: Wildcard Text2Prompt
author: The Stig
description:
Plugin to allow you to import Wildcard Text Files.
Each Wildcard must be on a seperate line.

name: Image to img Utilities
author: The Stig
description:
Plugin to assist with automating img2img creation.
Refer to the thread in Discord for more information.
